entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
